short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension searches amazon.com with whatever text the user has currently selected

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easy to search amazon.com for items or text you are currently looking at in the browser. Simply highlight the text you want to search for in amazon.com, right click on the highlight text, and click the "Amazon it!" menu entry. A separate tab will open with amazon.com and the search results.
